# robots.txt for https://dan10ish.github.io
# Generated automatically - Single Page Application (SPA)

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /fonts/
Allow: /icon.png
Allow: /manifest.json

# Block unnecessary crawling
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /_next/

# Crawling directives
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://dan10ish.github.io/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://dan10ish.github.io/sitemap-images.xml
